title: Number Line
text: To think about this question, you might want to locate $$2$$ and $$-20$$ on a number line.

title: Using Number Line to Reach Conclusion
text: For numbers a and $$b$$, when a is to the right of $$b$$ on the number line, we say $$a>b$$ (read "a is greater than b").

title: Answer
text: Since $$2$$ is to the right of $$-20$$ on the number line, we say $$2>-20$$.
